articles.title: 'The best one' - Chelsea's Lukaku relishes goal on Premier League return - SuperSport
articles.description: Chelsea striker Romelu Lukaku said his goal in Sunday's 2-0 win over London rivals Arsenal, the Belgium international's first match back with the European champions.

articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.title: Stocks, futures climb; dollar dips with treasuries - BNN
articles.description: U.S. equities rose Monday along with stocks in Europe as traders took advantage of last week’s selloff to pick up shares at more favorable valuations.
articles.content:
U.S. equities rose Monday along with stocks in Europe as traders took advantage of last weeks selloff to pick up shares at more favorable valuations.
